courseSectionInformation: Additional fees may apply. See Class Schedule. Prerequisite: ARTS 230.
description: Additional experience and experimentation in designing and executing jewelry and related objects through fabrication, refinement of surface embellishment, joining, and finishing skills; further exploration of metal as a medium of personal aesthetic expression. Additional fees may apply. See Class Schedule. Prerequisite: ARTS 230.
label: Jewelry/Metals II
sectionRegistrationNotes: Restricted to Graphic Design or Crafts or History of Art or Photography or Industrial Design or Painting or Sculpture or Art Education or New Media major(s).
